{
    "maxLineLength": 80
}
---
if (foo)
bar()

while(foo)
        bar();

for (const foo of bar)
baz()
    
for (const foo in bar)
baz()

for (let i=0;i<10;i++)
bar()
---
if (foo)
    bar();

while (foo)
    bar();

for (const foo of bar)
    baz();

for (const foo in bar)
    baz();

for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++)
    bar();
